messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Voice
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/6/02 7:31:59 AM Central Standard Time, ... incredibly ... Hey, that might just work - if I can make it funny.  I know its hard to break
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/6/02 7:31:59 AM Central Standard Time,
kbcdlovejo@... writes:

> Use the same voice when explaining things to HIM? Let him see how
incredibly
> grating it is?

Hey, that might just work - if I can make it funny. I know its hard to break
old habits. I still sometimes speak of myself in the third person - you
know, like "Mommy needs to take a shower." And I drive myself crazy about
it! After all, they are three and four now and used pronouns quite well.

I'll try it, thanks.

Elizabeth
